name: Get Actual Expense for Budget
query:
select gle.voucher_type AS "voucher_type:Link/DocType:", gle.voucher_no AS "Voucher:Dynamic Link/voucher_type:",
    gle.debit - gle.credit AS "Amount:Currency:150", gle.cost_center AS "Cost Center::", gle.account AS "Account::",
    gle.posting_date AS "Transaction Date:Date:150", gle.fiscal_year AS "Fiscal Year::"
from `tabGL Entry` gle
    where is_cancelled = 0
        and gle.account = %(account)s
        and gle.fiscal_year = %(fiscal_year)s
        and gle.company = %(company)s
        and gle.docstatus = 1 
        and exists (select tc.name from`tabCost Center` tc
                    INNER JOIN `tabCost Center` tca
                    where tca.name = %(cost_center)s
                    AND tc.lft >= tca.lft and tc.rgt <= tca.rgt
                    and tc.name = gle.cost_center)
